CHAT.comment: Dear Debra , I hope you come soon , because I miss you. We can go to the park and have lots_of fun. LOVE Chi [= full name]

Chi works very independently , deciding who and what to write on her own. Mot is very strict about punctuation but is very complimentary about Chi's penmanship; Mot wants Chi to specify where she want the addressee to come but Chi says <she knows what I'm talking about>; Mot uses the reading back of letter to EXP for a punctuation lession; Chi pauses between soon and because , so she should put a comma there

u.a: looks up for help , still hiding the paper
goes out to the porch while Chi writes
talks to Bro and others; Chi writes <I hope you>
reenters , looks at page , and sits down again
Chi holds pad across her knees and writes left handed
